bibdata.title: American Standard
Low Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers (600-Volt Insulation Class)
American Standard - Low Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers (600-Volt Insulation Class)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to all low-voltage power circuit breakers of the 600-volt insulation class capable of interrupting short-circuit currents in excess of 10,000 amp (amperes) for use with ac circuits. Other low-voltage power circuit breakers for use on circuits rated up to 1,000 volts ac and 3,000 volts dc are not covered by this standard; molded-case circuit breakers are specifically not covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
